p: In Figure 3, the curves of AV obtained for fried potato chips during shelf‐life are presented. AV from the extracted oil of samples indicated that the addition of M. communis, T. carmanicus essential oils, and BHA or TBHQ synthetic antioxidants significantly reduced AV in potato chips. Sunflower oil without any additive (control) produced severe acidity during potato frying; however, the addition of antioxidants, either synthetic (TBHQ and BHA) or natural ( M. communis and T. carmanicus), improved its acid value.
